custom-sql.sql: SELECT CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.* FROM CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel WHERE (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.commerceShippingFixedOptionId = ?) AND ( (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.commerceCountryId = ?) OR (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.commerceCountryId = 0) ) AND ( (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.commerceRegionId = ?) OR (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.commerceRegionId = 0) ) AND ( (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.zip = ?) OR (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.zip IS NULL) ) AND (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.weightFrom >= ?) AND (CommerceShippingFixedOptionRel.weightTo <= ?)
